About Me

Hi, I am Sadman Zarif. I am a Software Developer with 4+ years of experience. I have worked with more than 30 startups and recognized companies worldwide. I offer high-quality services (consulting and implementation).

Currently, I am working as a Web and App Developer.

I am also working as a content creator on my youtube channel.

I use these technologies for my development:

  • React
  • React Native
  • MERN Stack
  • Next JS
  • Python and Django
  • PHP and Laravel
  • Flutter
  • PHPStorm as a code editor
